reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Camera
reviews.reviewText: We bought this camera for our daughter. She wnat to take some pcitures intead of using her phone.This was an excellent small camera with excellent quality images. Great for kids to take out when they explorer to take photos.She loved the quality and ease of the camera. If you want a camera that is not going to break the bank, give you quality pics and is fun and easy I recommend this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ideal Camera for a young Child. Great Quality and east to use.
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this camera for our 7 year old granddaughter for Christmas. She loved it and was taking pictures right away. It was very easy for her to operate. The anti-shake feature is super. She was able to take pictures with clarity and lots of details. Portability and Durability: the neck lanyard make this camera highly portable and easy to carry a round, which is very imported with younger children.Great value for the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sturdy Camera!
reviews.reviewText: My 5 year old daughter received this for Christmas and I wanted to wait a little bit before doing a review. This camera is great. It takes good quality photos, has a pretty good battery life, and is sturdy! She has dropped it multiple times but the shell of the camera has a kind of rubbery quality to it and it is still in perfect working condition. The included lanyard is great, when she uses it, though! I definitely recommend this camera for young kids. She's having a blast taking videos and photos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a great camera at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to use, purchased this for my niece and she loves it! I went back and purchased one for my son. Battery life is good and the durable; can handle wear and tear from an 8 yr old. Recommend for a fun, cute gift idea that lasts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best gift ever!
reviews.reviewText: The only thing my 2 kids (6 & 7) wanted for Christmas was a camera! One wanted black and the other pink. Thankful this camera comes in multiple colors. They've not put them down since Christmas. They've held up extremely well even with being dropped multiple times. My oldest who can read is easily able to figure out all the settings and features. It is very user friendly. The quality of the photos is even better than you'd expect. Overall very pleased with the camera and my kids couldn't love them more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for kids!
reviews.reviewText: I got the pink one for Christmas for my 6yr daughter and she loves it! This fits her so well and a great first camera for her age. She’s learning alot from this. It’s durable, cute and she can easily take it with her wherever she goes because it comes with a cute laniard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool little Camers
reviews.reviewText: Great little camera for my 10 yr old son. It has enough features for him, zoom, stills, video and more. You can even download the pictures to your computer or TV.Very easy to learn. I recommend this to everyone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for kids
reviews.reviewText: So what if the quality is subpar? It's cheap, it comes with a necklace hanger, and it's really easy to get the hang of using. My 6 year old can't stop taking pictures of everything. Yes, that's pictures of his legos.This is not a camera for teenagers and definitely not for adults. But really great for the kids!The battery is lasting really well too and it comes with a decent size memory card.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product and worth to buy
reviews.reviewText: Got this for a few days now and I love it! The size it’s so perfect I can just fit it in my bag the battery lasts long and is so easy and simple to use…This is my first ever camera and everything was so simple and easy to understand and use. The picture quality is really great quality too.Comes with loads of little extras but most importantly a memory card and 2 batteries!!Definitely worth the purchase. I would recommend this to friends!

I purchased this camera for my kid. Kid just loves it. She likes the green colour and its easy-to-use functions. After school, I always see her play with the new camera. The photo quality is good for a kid. All in all, it is a good product with value. Very happy with the purchase.

Really good camera! Easy to operate and great quality pictures, I bought this for my daughter who wanted to be able to takephotos with her friends over the holidays. I was so impressed with the image quality and how easy it is to use! My toddler asks to see the photos and videos that we have taken all the time and is even able to snap a few pictures of her own. This camera is a fantastic value for the price.I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a versatile and user-friendly digital camera.

My son loved his new camera which we ordered for his birthday.The camera is lightweight and sturdy in it's functionality so perfect for my son to use. I like the simple way to charge the battery and it fits nicely into him pocket.The picture quality is much better than expected. The 32GB storage is reasonable and can also be expanded. 2 batteries is a total winner, always have a spare with you.Great budget friendly camera. I am truly delighted with this purchase.
I love this color, this camera is light than my old one and very easy to use.very samll can put in the pocket or hang on the nack.
